result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant Diana R Wood not in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Notice mail returned to court.  Court forfeits bond and orders to pay restitution.

to withdraw as counsel
Fax'd Cover Letter from atty. Melka

Attorney Maura O'Connell Melka in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Auth on file, however there has been little to no contact.  Attorney Melka will be filing a Motion to Withdraw in writing.  Case is resolved, however, no contact.  Court gives Attorney Melka new address, however motion will be filed.  State request warrant.    Based on non-appearance, court authorized warrant.
Return date at 03-10-2016 01:00 pm

Defendant Diana R Wood appeared by video means with Attorney ORourke. Prosecuting Atty Sue Mueller appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney ORourke gives explanation and request bond reinstatement and notice in hand of new dates.  State request small cash bond of $150.00.  Court sets $150.00 CASH bond.  Attorney ORourke request revision of $100.00. COURT SO ORDERS $100.00 CASH BOND.  Return date scheduled for March 10, 2016 at 01:00 pm.
body
Attorney Maura O'Connell Melka in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Based on non-appearance, court authorized warrant
Plea/sentencing hearing at 12-10-2015 01:00 pm

Defendant Diana R Wood in court with attorney Maura O'Connell Melka.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Melka states they will need a reset but believe it will settle.  Bond continued.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for December 10, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
Return date at 11-13-2015 01:00 pm

Attorney Maura O'Connell Melka in court.  Dennis Joseph Ryan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Melka questions whether the NOH for her client was returned.  Court notes it was not returned.  Atty Melka requests mandatory appearance be put on notice and reset it out.  State doesn't object.  Bond continued.  Return date scheduled for November 13, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
Return date at 10-26-2015 01:00 pm

Attorney Maura O'Connell Melka in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Melka gives status.  Defendant has had medical issues.  Contact has been good, however no appearance today.  Attorney Melka gives further status and request 30 days.  State request personal appearance.  Court orders.  Bond continues.  Return date scheduled for October 26, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
Return date at 09-29-2015 01:00 pm

Defendant Diana R Wood in court with attorney Maura O'Connell Melka.  Linda Ann Hoffman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Melka states offer was to be accepted but DE has been unable to meet the condition precedent due to some medical issues.  Requests reset.  Bond continued.  Return date scheduled for September 29, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
Return date at 07-31-2015 01:00 pm
Attorney Maura O'Connell Melka in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  No transportation.  Request reset.  Bond continues.  Return date scheduled for July 31, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
Return date at 06-05-2015 01:00 pm

Defendant Diana R Wood in court with attorney Maura O'Connell Melka.  Dennis Joseph Ryan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Melka needs reset to meet restitution requirements prior to sentencing.  Bond continued.  Return date scheduled for June 5, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
Return date on May 7, 2015 at 01:00 pm.

Attorney Maura O'Connell Melka in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Offer is for prepayment, reset to get payment done.  Bond continues.  Return date scheduled for May 7, 2015 at 01:00 pm.

records.addlTxt: public defender eligibility

Defendant Diana R Wood in court.  Kevin R. Calkins appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court reviews financial information.  Court appoints Attorney Maura Melka @$65/hr @ $50.00/month commencing on or before March 23, 2015.  Defendant to pay on own/no income assignment. 
915 Ash St., Baraboo  963-3636
Indigency hearing on February 23, 2015 at 02:30 pm.

Pre-trial conference on February 27, 2015 at 11:00 am.
Return date on March 11, 2015 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Diana R Wood in court.  Dennis Joseph Ryan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waives reading of complaint. Advised rights to an attorney, waived today only.  File set for pre-trial conference/return date.  Bond continues.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 27, 2015 at 11:00 am.  Return date scheduled for March 11, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
